item.title: GNU/Linux and BaSH
item.description: UNDER TRANSLATION #!/bin/bash Duration: 40 Hours Teacher: Gerardo Gutiérrez Contacto: muzgash@gmail.com Sylabus Command Line Command Line Environment variables Redirectoins and quoting Regular Expressions SED AWK Bash - Scripting Scripting Loops File IO bc Arrays “Parallel” BaSH BaSH & qsub Command Line In order to get familiar with the system, in this section we are going to do basic commands that help us in any unix-like system.
